original_text: These are the descendants of Shem. They lived in groups in their own parts of the land. Each group spoke their own language.
korean_text: 이들은 셈의 자손이니 그 족속과 언어와 지방과 나라대로였더라

sentences.original_text: These are the descendants of Shem.
in their own parts of the land.
Each group spoke their own language.
